FindingName: No Group Policy Objects Defining Log Size and Retention
Description: Group Policy Objects are used to centralize enforcement of configurations and policies for domain user and computer assets. GPO's can be leveraged to define log file size and retention.
Remediation: Create a Group Policy Object to enforce the configuration of logging on servers and endpoints. At a minimum logging should be enabled and enforced on mission critical systems.
